long_description: Made from natural materials and decorated with original printed artwork, the Sherpani Iris Daypack offers a stylish look and useful features for your everyday urban adventures. Original print by artist Cathy Nichols has a durable polyurethane coating to preserve its beauty. Made from natural-fiber, heavy cotton canvas with faux-leather trim and light-colored lining. Features a roomy main compartment with organization and 2 exterior pockets. Sherpani Iris Daypack has adjustable, heavy-duty cotton-webbing shoulder straps and a grab handle.
short_description: Made from natural materials and decorated with original printed artwork, the Sherpani Iris Daypack offers a stylish look and useful features for your everyday urban adventures.
